quoteText:
At any time you can retrieve your entire Content Data package from MeWe, using the “Download Your Content” feature in your account. When you select this feature, you will be able to download your Content Data to your personal device and decide how to migrate that data anywhere you choose.

Deleting Your Account - Right to Erasure

At all times you have an easy way to opt out of our service and delete your account as well as ALL of your Content Data, if you do not wish to continue using our services.
title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data
